column3: Welcome to Wachumeqimeqi, a market you might say is for the locals. But do feel free to have a look around─who knows, you may just find wares that pique your interest.
It is my wish that both customers and shop owners alike feel mutual satisfaction with their transactions in the market, that this house of countless beads may shine more brilliantly than ever.
With your help, I believe that wish will come true. I look forward to seeing what you accomplish, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.

You've accomplished all I hoped, and so much more, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Wachumeqimeqi is veritably glowing with revitalized life. Were it up to me, I'd have you remain as an artisan in these markets long-term.
Meet me at the Gleamsands! I'll be along just as soon as I find someone to stand in for me.
I hope we can all continue to rely on your support. We'll draw upon every last connection we have to make this event a reality!
By all means, go and make your rounds! The others will surely be delighted to tell you of their progress thus far.
It's another busy day here in Wachumeqimeqi, but we're always thankful for your custom.

Be they neighbors or tourists, people of all cultures are brought together by commerce. You, too, are a precious bead in our necklace, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─never forget that.
